Controller

Class AppointmentsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.AppointmentsController

  • public class AppointmentsController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller for the Appointments It handles all the logic for the Appointments

      • getAppointmentsByMonth

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByMonth()
        Returns a list of appointments for the current month and year.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Appointment objects, or null if there was an error accessing the database

      • getAppointmentsByWeek

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByWeek()
        Returns an ArrayList of Appointment objects for appointments scheduled in the current week.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Appointment objects, or null if there was an error retrieving data from the database.

      • isAppointmentIn15Minute

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> isAppointmentIn15Minute()
        Retrieves a list of appointments that start within the next 15 minutes.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Appointment objects, or null if there was an error connecting to the database.

      • getReport1Data

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Report> getReport1Data()
        Retrieves data for report 1 from the database.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Report objects, where each Report object contains information about the appointment type, the month in which the appointments occurred, and the number of appointments for that type in that month. Returns null if there was an error connecting to the database or retrieving the data.

      • getReport2Data

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> getReport2Data()
        Retrieves data for report 2 from the database.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Appointment objects, where each Appointment object contains information about the appointment ID, title, description, type, start time, end time, and customer ID. Returns null if there was an error connecting to the database or

      • getReport3Data

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> getReport3Data()
        Retrieves data for report 3 from the database.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Appointment objects, where each Appointment object contains information about the appointment ID, start time, end time, customer name, and contact name. Returns null if there was an error connecting to the database or

      • isOverlappingAppointment

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> isOverlappingAppointment(java.lang.String start,
                                                                        java.lang.String end)
        Retrieves data for isOverlappingAppointment from the database.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Appointment objects, where each Appointment object contains information about the appointment ID, start time, and end time. Returns null if there was an error connecting to the database or

      • canceledAppointments

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> canceledAppointments()
        Retrieves data for canceledAppointments from the database.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Appointment objects, where each Appointment object contains information about the appointment ID and type. Returns null if there was an error connecting to the database or
